messages.header: „BETTER TO FAIL IN THE ORIGINALITY, THAN TO SUCCEED IN THE COPY...“
messages.headerDesc: Hello, my name is Lukáš Prchal and you may know me as Gennario... I am a Graphic and UX/UI designer and Java developer from Czech Republic.
messages.javaDescription: If we look into my history, I've created a lot of original minecraft plugins in Java. I don't write in Java anymore.
messages.gfxDescription: I have several years of experience in brading design,logo designing and creating various graphic works.
messages.uxDescription:
I design various types of websites and mobile/desktop applications.
Basic experience so far!
